data.title: Interstellar Soundtrack - Is this the kind of music that takes you places?
data.meta_description: I get serious goosebumps listening to Interstellar's soundtrack. I get so many questions about this universe, our existence, space travel etc etc whenever I...

I get serious goosebumps listening to Interstellar's soundtrack. I get so many questions about this universe, our existence, space travel etc etc whenever I listen to the soundtrack. What do you guys think about it?

Listen to Time, the Inception theme. Hans Zimmer is a legend when it comes to this stuff.

Hands down the best theme you'll ever hear. Makes me feel like I can climb everest in a chaddi with no equipment.
